Sounds like Xnew should be a list of 300 tensors, each one shaped 2500x12.
…

body:
Sounds like Xnew should be a list of 300 tensors, each one shaped 2500x12.

On Sat, May 6, 2017 at 3:15 PM, Kevin Shaw <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Perhaps a related question is: what size *should* Xnew be? Given the
> batch size of 2500, and a frame size of (300 x 12), where the feature
> vector length for each time step is 12.
>
> —
